input.oldString:
<Button
                variant="ghost"
                size="sm"
                onClick={swapLanguages}
                disabled={sourceLang === "auto"}
                className="p-2"
              >
                <ArrowUpDown className="h-4 w-4" />
input.newString:
<Button
                variant="ghost"
                size="lg"
                onClick={swapLanguages}
                disabled={sourceLang === "auto"}
                className="p-3 hover:bg-blue-50 hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors"
              >
                <ArrowUpDown className="h-5 w-5" />
